Articles

Contributing

How to contribute code

Read this vignette to learn how to contribute code of your own to {tidytof}.

Single-cell

Reading and writing data

Read this vignette to learn how to read data from FCS and CSV files on disk and how to write data to FCS and CSV files on disk.

Quality control

Read this vignette to learn how to perform basic quality control analyses on high-dimensional cytometry data with {tidytof}.

Preprocessing

Read this vignette to learn how to clean and preprocess CyTOF data using {tidytof}.

Downsampling

Read this vignette to learn how to downsample a high-dimensional cytometry dataset to a smaller number of cells using {tidytof}.

Dimensionality reduction

Read this vignette to learn how visualize single-cell phenotypes in low-dimensional space using dimensionality reduction algorithms (PCA, UMAP, tSNE)

Cluster

Clustering and metaclustering

Read this vignette to learn how to identify clusters of cells with shared phenotypic characteristics using {tidytof}.

Differential discovery analysis

Read this vignette to learn how to compare cluster abundance and marker expression across experimental/clinical variables using various statistical tools.

Feature extraction

Read this vignette to learn how to compute summary statistics like cluster abundance and cluster marker expression using {tidytof}

Sample

Building predictive models

Read this vignette to learn how to compute summary statistics like cluster abundance and cluster marker expression using {tidytof}
